item.title: MAIN DECK CARGO SIGNALING SYSTEM – PARTIAL SYSTEM INOP

numlitem.para: No four adjacent main deck ceiling lights may be inoperative, and
No four adjacent main deck speakers may be inoperative.

placard.para: Placard below Captains PFD on P-1-1 panel: "MAIN DK CARGO SIG SYS INOP". Enter Item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
